content.rendered:
Friday, April 11, 2025

Today is a “B” Day

Have a Relaxing and Safe break from school 😊

  • It’s time for some Bucks by the Boatload! Teachers – please have your LiveSchool accounts ready! Today we will award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who didn’t need a reminder about their hood or earbuds/headphones on their head this morning. As a reminder, before you enter the building, hoods should be put down and all earbuds or headphones should be removed from your ears. Students – keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

 

 

*Today’s lunch is pizza, caesar salad, emoji grahams and blue raspberry apple sauce  

 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND!

 

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
